timeline.message: Fixing type mismatch between Integer and ForceAlignment
Fixing implicit casts of double to int
Fixing instances of boxed variables never being null

timeline.body: Would this break if placed in a [`try (...) {` with resources block](https://docs.oracle.com/javase/tutorial/essential/exceptions/tryResourceClose.html) instead?
timeline.bodyText: Would this break if placed in a try (...) { with resources block instead?
timeline.bodyHTML: Would this break if placed in a try (...) { with resources block instead?
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: Maybe? I'll push a test and see if it does
replies.author: Windchild292

replies.bodyText: It does not appear to break, so I'll swap over to try() with resources instead.
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyHTML: Same comment regarding try-with-resources block.
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

timeline.body:
Just cast to double, avoid multiplying by 1.0.
```suggestion
            leasedLargeMechDropships = noMech / (double)largeDropshipMechCapacity;
```
timeline.bodyHTML:
Just cast to double, avoid multiplying by 1.0.

Suggested change
leasedLargeMechDropships = (noMech / (largeDropshipMechCapacity * 1.0));
leasedLargeMechDropships = noMech / (double)largeDropshipMechCapacity;
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: I just realised why that didn't work originally... I put it on the divisor instead of the dividend...
replies.author: Windchild292

timeline.bodyHTML:

leasedAverageMechDropships = (noMech / (averageDropshipMechCapacity * 1.0));
leasedAverageMechDropships = noMech / (double)averageDropshipMechCapacity;

> commit e568f2559c07db716b0cfb7a52fdcd8d75b2ec1b (origin/plugin)
> Author: Carl Spain <neoancient@megamek.org>
> Date:   Sun Jun 17 22:07:36 2018 -0500
>
>    Added support for plugins requiring a script engine.
>
>    The JRE includes support for JavaScript. Users can add support for other
>    languages by adding the engine jar to the plugin directory, where it
>    will be dynamically loaded as a service. The engine is selected based on
>    the script's file extension.

Per:

$ git log --diff-filter=A -- MekHQ/src/mekhq/module/ScriptPluginManager.java
commit e568f25 (origin/plugin)
Author: Carl Spain neoancient@megamek.org
Date:   Sun Jun 17 22:07:36 2018 -0500
Added support for plugins requiring a script engine.
The JRE includes support for JavaScript. Users can add support for other
languages by adding the engine jar to the plugin directory, where it
will be dynamically loaded as a service. The engine is selected based on
the script's file extension.
timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
* Copyright (c) 2020 The MegaMek Team. All rights reserved.

Per:

$ git log --diff-filter=A -- MekHQ/src/mekhq/module/ScriptPluginManager.java
commit e568f25 (origin/plugin)
Author: Carl Spain neoancient@megamek.org
Date: Sun Jun 17 22:07:36 2018 -0500

Added support for plugins requiring a script engine.

The JRE includes support for JavaScript. Users can add support for other
languages by adding the engine jar to the plugin directory, where it
will be dynamically loaded as a service. The engine is selected based on
the script's file extension.

timeline.message: Changing a try catch to a try(resources) catch
Changing try{} catch to try(resources){}catch statements

timeline.bodyHTML: Why was this commented out?
timeline.author: sixlettervariables

replies.bodyText: The inner code already was, so we were running a loop without processing anything.
replies.author: Windchild292
